title: Two weeks after the 2023 Maui wildfires: drinking water experiences and needs
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,2341-2356
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00216D, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Andrew J. Whelton, Paula D. Coelho, Christopher Shuler, Aurora Kagawa-Viviani, Kellie D. P. Cole, Stefanie Surdyka, Stephanie Heffner
To understand community impacts and needs after the August 2023 Maui wildfires, we conducted a rapid survey-based field investigation two weeks after the incident.
